messages.message: @Ashish just to confirm - in this prod release, does the launcher UI get released by default? or still by setting the cookie
Only if @Anant is willing to put his neck on the line. Otherwise, I prefer to have the feature controlled via a switch.
i think he was going to be crazy cow boy with the next release :slightly_smiling_face:
I think we can still take some time before turning it on by default

I'm okay with even not putting in a switch, and just letting a few people know how to turn it on through cookies. That way we can give ourselves more time to get sued to it, get feedback, and iterate, and we can wait to release it for real until we're ready to force it upon people. Could be dangerous to release a change as big as this with an "off" switch because some people will turn it off without even trying to get used to it.
The cookie approach works. We can push entire Instabase to dogfood it first.
